title: Love the Way You Lie
description:
A dark romance about the lies that lead us down…
I’ll do anything to get safe, even if that means working at the scariest club in town.I’ll do anything to stay hidden, even if it means taking off my clothes for strangers.I’ll do anything to be free. Except give him up. When he looks at me, I forget why I can’t have him. He’s beautiful and scarred. His body fits mine, filling the places where I’m hollow, rough where I am soft.He’s the one man who wants to help me, but he has his own agenda. He has questions I can’t answer. What are you afraid of?You.
author: Skye Warren
